title: The Abominable Snowman (1957 Horror) Myth or monster? The truth is terrifying

sources.title: The Abominable Snowman (1957 Horror) Myth or monster? The truth is terrifying
sources.description:
In the snow-capped peaks of the Himalayas, Dr. John Rollason and Tom Friend find themselves in a chilling game of survival as they confront the elusive Yeti in "The Abominable Snowman." This 1957 film weaves a tale of scientific curiosity and greed, where the icy grip of the unknown leads to a harrowing showdown between man and myth.

Original Title: The Abominable Snowman
Alternative title: Mostruoso Uomo Delle Nevi

Director: Val Guest
Writers: Nigel Kneale

Main Cast:
Forrest Tucker - Tom Friend
Peter Cushing - Dr. John Rollason
Maureen Connell - Helen Rollason
Richard Wattis - Peter Fox

Genres: Fantasy, Horror
Release Date: 1957
Filming Location: Himalayas
